doc.field: Autobiography, 6 pp., 1981; Speech at Lenin 100th birthday conference; GM article, published in Soviet Contemporary; Letters to PDW editorial board, 1979-1986; Letters to Gus Hall, 1978-1986; Correspondence with Henry Winston, 1973-1986; "Letters" 1968-1984; "Correspondence" 1973-1985; including George Myers, Carl Winter, Mike Zagarell; Testimonial dinners 1970s-1980s; Articles and speeches on trade union matters circa 1979-1986.
